::DrillBit::

DrillBit almost lost himself in the kiss. He could stay and do this
forever, the feel of her lips with his. Then he remembered why he had
came.
"You know, we should start the training. I've picked out a area. All we
have to do his get the troops, and get out there." He said, kissing her
again, again, and again.
